title: Weird chanting in summonses rift
body: My last couple games I've been playing in summonses rift my screens tip edges darken something starts chanting and cheering. I'm not really worried about anything ( unless I should be ) I'd just like to know how to turn it off because it keeps distracting me and sometimes getting me killed.

replies.body: Does this only happen in Summoners Rift? Also, can you ensure you don't have any background apps open or minimized that may be causing this?
Yes only in SR and my CPU is super old so I can't have any other tabs open and play this at the same time

I was informed this was likely part of the teaser in SR for Yorick's rework, so *Nosafterburn* was definitely spot on here. 

Let me know if you have any questions.

Mate that sounds like an ability. I can't really say which one but could be a Nocturne. I'd look at which champions are in the game when it happens. It could be from (off the top my head, may be more) Nocturne, Kindred, Illaoi, Sion. If you want to know for sure, check match history and tell me what champs were in a game you know it happened it. I'll tell you which champion, what ability, and how to counter it. Although you can't turn it off, it's meant to disorientate you or alert you.

I main Sion so that probably it
Zion Master Yi lulu Ashe Annie Fiddlesticks Orianna Quin miss fortune Yasou

They are coming after you.

Run.

*RUN*
Well Yorick is coming back; maybe it's his new ghouls taunting and haunting you.
